circumstances: While taking off from Delavan-Lake Lawn Airport, the left engine lost power. The pilot elected to make an emergency landing but people on the ground forced him to retard this procedure. He attempted to land further but the airplane lost height and crashed in flames in a field. The airplane was destroyed and all three occupants were injured, the pilot seriously.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure for undetermined reasons. The following factors were reported: 
- Evasive maneuver to avoid collision with persons on ground,
- Partial loss of power on one engine.
